headline: Vonage Recognized in the GartnerⓇ Magic Quadrant™ for Contact Center as a Service
summary: HOLMDEL, N.J., September 18, 2025--Vonage, a part of Ericsson (NASDAQ: ERIC) today announced it has been recognized in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Contact Center as a Service (CCaaS). Named a Niche Player, Vonage believes this recognition highlights how the company helps companies increase agent productivity and deliver more personalized customer experiences with its innovative AI-powered technologies.

headline: Intellistack Reinvents Contract Lifecycle Management With Unlimited User Access and No Per-Envelope Costs
summary: DENVER, September 18, 2025--Intellistack, formerly Formstack and a leader in data capture and workflow automation, today announced the launch of Intellistack Streamline CLM, a next-generation Contract Lifecycle Management solution built directly into the company’s AI-driven, no-code process automation Intellistack Streamline platform. headline: This Week In E-Commerce - India's B2C E-Commerce Exports Set For Significant Growth
summary: India's cross-border B2C e-commerce market is experiencing rapid growth, with exports expected to significantly increase in the coming years. India's share in the global market is projected to rise from a modest 0.16% in FY 2023 to over 1.41% by FY 2030. Key factors propelling this growth include the widespread availability of affordable data, the adoption of smartphones, and improvements in logistics systems, which collectively enhance the online shopping experience. Indian consumers are...
